{{dcl begin}}

constexpr index_type extent( rank_type r ) const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the extent of a {{tt|mdspan}} at the rank index {{c|r}}. Equivalent to {{c|return extents().extent(r);}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|r|The rank index to get the extent size of}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The extent at the given rank index.
